title: Further for Cinema/Theater having number of seats 600 or more mentioned in the last license, in the old existing cinema/Theater may be developed with at least 200 seats without insisting provision of 33% of the number of seats mentioned in the last license, in the old existing cinema/Theater
clause_text: Further for Cinema/Theater having number of seats 600 or more mentioned in the last license, in the old existing cinema/Theater may be developed with at least 200 seats without insisting provision of 33% of the number of seats mentioned in the last license, in the old existing cinema/Theater.
